abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Ivory
            Coast Protected Area Project for Cote d'Ivoire is to
            improve the sustainable management of the fauna and habitat
            of the Comoe national park. This restructuring will bring
            the following changes: (i) an extension of the closing date
            from November 30, 2013 to December 31, 2014; (ii) changes in
            indicators to improve their measurability and usefulness;
            and (iii) reallocations of funds between categories which
            will reflect the need for normal adjustments based on
            project implementation experience to date.
